```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE)
```


This website was created to celebrate the hard work of the students in COMP/STAT 112 in the 2020-21 academic year at Macalester College. Students worked on perfecting these graphs over seven weeks, receiving feedback each week from their professor, Lisa Lendway (that's me). 

They all used data that I collected from my garden from about mid-June to present (mid-October) 2020. It is a treat to have all these graphs that celebrate my jungle garden!

<center>

![The Jungle Garden at its finest](../garden_graph_showcase_mod1/garden.png){width=600}

</center>
